translation: We have entered the morning and the whole kingdom belongs to Allah

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshiped but You
I am pleased with Allah as my Lord
Glory be to Allah
All praise is due to Allah
Allah is the Greatest
There is no god but Allah
I ask Allah for forgiveness
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad

arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
translation: There is no power nor strength except with Allah
O Allah, make me among those who repent
O Allah, make me among those who purify themselves
O Allah, we have entered the morning and the kingdom is Yours
We have entered the evening and the kingdom belongs to Allah
O Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth
O Allah, I ask You for wellbeing
Glory and praise be to Allah
I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise
O Allah, forgive me and my parents
O Allah, help me to remember You
O Allah, make me among the doers of good
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves
My Lord, forgive me and my parents
O Allah, I ask You for contentment
O Allah, make me among the patient
O Allah, guide me and make me steadfast

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
There is no god but Allah
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds
O Allah, make me among those who rely on You
My Lord, increase me in knowledge
Our Lord, give us good in this world
Our Lord, give us good in the Hereafter
Our Lord, make us Muslims devoted to You
Our Lord, make us among the inheritors
Our Lord, forgive us our sins

arabic: رَبَّنَا وَلاَ تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لاَ طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ
translation: Our Lord, do not burden us beyond our capacity
Our Lord, forgive us and have mercy on us
Our Lord, perfect our light for us
